name: barde
normalized: there are three things that i seek.
a toll, a devil from the otherworld, and lastly, a philosopher's stone.

name: barde
normalized: the girl called miki is already dead.
it's a flesh and blood puppet of my own creation.

name: barde
normalized: all who oppose me face certain death.
heed my words,witch and immortal.

name: rikurou
normalized: (damn you… barde barde…)

name: rikurou
normalized: (miki's working… for a guy like him…)

name: rikurou
normalized: (miki!

name: miki
normalized: goodbye… rikurou…"

name: rikurou
normalized: (please wait, miki!

name: rikurou
normalized: (miki!

name: rikurou
normalized: (i, i lo--)

name: rikurou
normalized: (miki--)
she's not there when i reach out for her.
it's then that i realize i'm lying on a bed.

name: rikurou
normalized: (a dream…)
no, miki's disappearance wasn't a dream.

name: rikurou
normalized: (this isn't a dream…)
where am i?
what's happened since then?
where's barde?
where's miki?
where's annerose?
at least my body's back to normal.

name: neu
normalized: young lad, are you awake?
i hear a gentle voice.

name: rikurou
normalized: miss neu?
what are you doing here?
asking, i sit up.

name: neu
normalized: i heard aishe's cry for help.
but i was a bit too late.
thank goodness you're safe, though.

name: rikurou
normalized: miss neu…"
i could hear the detachment in her voice.
that makes her grief over aishe's death all the more palpable.
come to think of it, the first time i met aishe was at neu's magic temple.
i'm sure neu was an old lady aishe could open her heartup to.

name: annerose
normalized: ah… rick, are you up?

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!
annerose popped herself up off the wall she'd been leaning on.

name: annerose
normalized: you really know how to sack out, don't you?
well, sleep long, grow strong, they say.

name: rikurou
normalized: forget about me annerose, what about michiko!?
that idiot went and got kidnapped by barde!
annerose lays her hand on me as i hurriedly try to get outof bed.

name: annerose
normalized: i know.
grandma told me.
that's why she came after us.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh…?

name: neu
normalized: i'm sorry, i was careless.
i never imagined it was michiko who barde was after.

name: annerose
normalized: you don't need to apologize, grandma.
it's my fault for letting him waltz right in and snatch her away like he did.

name: neu
normalized: hrmhrm.
making mistakes is part of growing up for youngones.
that goes double for you, little anne.

name: annerose
normalized: yeah, yeah.
everyone and their brother looks like they're screwing up next to you, grandma.
sigh…"
annerose sighs before continuing.

name: annerose
normalized: still, i can't believe barde set all this up just to take michiko from me.
he really knows how to get under people's skin.
she says derisively.

name: rikurou
normalized: what do you mean…?

name: annerose
normalized: he had it all planned out from the moment miki showed up at our doorstep.

name: rikurou
normalized: …miki?
annerose nods.

name: annerose
normalized: barde was after michiko, a powerful devil from the otherworld made manifest in ours.

name: rikurou
normalized: yeah, that's what he said.

name: annerose
normalized: and i was in the way of that.
because michiko was always by my side.
but he didn't have the guts to take me on himself.

name: neu
normalized: i don't think anyone with a sound head on their shoulders would openly challenge the steel witch.

name: annerose
normalized: he's already 100% challenging me in my book.
and so, he came up with a way to separate michiko and i.
that's what he used miki as his tool for.

name: rikurou
normalized: he used miki?
an apprehensive look crosses annerose's face in light of my feelings, but it only lasts a moment.

name: annerose
normalized: you already know, don't you?
miki is a puppet created by barde.
my chest tightens at her words.
barde had said so himself.
the girl called miki is already dead, and her soul had been sealed in the puppet he'd made.
i don't know if that's true or not.
but it remains a fact that miki was following barde's orders.
with empty, doll-like eyes.

name: rikurou
normalized: miki, the same miki who was with us is really just a… a puppet made by barde… i just can't--"

name: annerose
normalized: there's no reason to doubt him.

name: neu
normalized: i agree.
even though it's hard for you.

name: rikurou
normalized: you're… probably right…"
miki is a puppet.
a simple tool created by barde.

name: annerose
normalized: i do think that the werewolf -- eiichi otonashi really did have a sister named miki.

name: annerose
normalized: barde called forth her soul and transferred it into his puppet.
along with some conveniently planted memories.

name: rikurou
normalized: memories?

name: annerose
normalized: memories of a brave little sister searching for her missing brother.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!?

name: annerose
normalized: she shows up looking for me, then along comes the werewolf like he's chasing after her.
that's what got my attention.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah… aah…"
she's right.
at first, annerose had no interest whatsoever in miki.
it was only after the werewolf appeared and she realized it was targeting miki that she was inclined to take up her request.

name: annerose
normalized: and so, after i stuck my nose in the werewolf business, he set his precious zombie army loose on us.

name: rikurou
normalized: was that to really drag you into things?

name: annerose
normalized: i'm sure that was part of it.
from an endgame perspective, getting tied up with everything also made me an enemy of amidahara, after all.

name: rikurou
normalized: then what was he really after?

name: annerose
normalized: his true goal was to weaken michiko by having her use up her magical energy.
enough so that she couldn't stay by my side, at least.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah!
and then he'd have the werewolf kidnap miki--"
annerose nods in frustration.

name: annerose
normalized: yes, to lure me into going after them.
leaving michiko at home alone and weak.

name: annerose
normalized: awakening to your immortal powers was probably a welcome development for barde as well.

name: rikurou
normalized: yeah…"
she's right.
if i'd been my usual self back then, annerose might have waited for michiko to recover.
however, i did awaken to my immortal power, and was entrusted by michiko with kongo yasha.

name: annerose
normalized: it was probably a snap for him to kidnap michiko while she was all by herself.

name: rikurou
normalized: that son of a…!
i punch the bed in a rage.
i even ended up activating my immortal power and openeda big hole in the expensive looking bed with a thunk.

name: annerose
normalized: hey, now!
don't start going berserk in here!

name: rikurou
normalized: oh… s-sorry…"
annerose looks at me in surprise as i stroke my fracturedhand.

name: annerose
normalized: well, i assume my going straight to aishe wasn't part of his plan.

name: annerose
normalized: barde was after aishe's philosopher's stone.
he must have thought it'd spell trouble if aishe and i teamed up -- not that that would ever happen, though.

name: rikurou
normalized: but that is what he thought.
that's why he came out from behind the scenes to meet with me.

name: annerose
normalized: and used miki as a handy tool once more.
annerose was putting it bluntly, but i knew what she really meant.
if i hadn't done what i did with miki, aishe might not have had to die.
even my shameful, perverted side had been used by barde.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose, i… i…"
annerose doesn't know about that yet.
no, perhaps she already does.

name: annerose
normalized: rick, there's no point going 'round and 'round about it.
we fell for barde's trap.
that's all.
her flat tone drives it home that she knows everything.

name: neu
normalized: mistakes are what youth is all about.
young lad, what you should be focusing on now is what barde's after.
i lift my face in a flash at neu patting my shoulder.

name: rikurou
normalized: what he's after!?
do you know what barde's after!?

name: annerose
normalized: something nefarious, of course.
annerose sounds like she couldn't find it any less surprising.

name: rikurou
normalized: what's he trying to do!?
what does he want with michiko and that philosopher's stone thing he stole from aishe!?

name: annerose
normalized: grandma.
she prompts neu with a look like she doesn't want to even waste her time talking about it.

name: neu
normalized: he's attempting to open a gate to the otherworld.

name: rikurou
normalized: a gate to the otherworld!?
you mean the demon world!?

name: neu
normalized: no.
to another world inhabited by the higher beings that people call gods and devils.
michiko's home.

name: rikurou
normalized: what's barde trying to do by opening this gate to the otherworld!?

name: neu
normalized: i don't know.
but little anne's right, it's sure to amount to no good.

name: neu
normalized: but the otherworld is named so for a reason.
it must never come in contact with ours.

name: neu
normalized: if he recklessly opens the gate and disrupts the time-space continuum, it's possible that amidahara will not survive the aftermath.

name: rikurou
normalized: wha…!?
amidahara won't survive the aftermath!?
is barde planning to destroy amidahara!?
he couldn't be!?

name: rikurou
normalized: a-annerose!
annerose bonks me over the head as i start freaking out.

name: annerose
normalized: and that's what we're dealing with.
okay, time to move, rick!
your wounds are closed up, right!?

name: rikurou
normalized: huh!?
but we don't even know where barde is…!

name: annerose
normalized: take a look, aishe held up her end for us after all.
annerose points at the floor.
the word "nakanoshima!
" is written in blood.
it's the blood she coughed up as she died.
all to help us in her very last moments.

name: rikurou
normalized: …aishe.
i get up off the bed and pick up kongo yasha propped up against it.

name: annerose
normalized: it's northwest of bandit street.
takes you back, doesn't it?

name: rikurou
normalized: yeah… um, annerose?
annerose stops on her way out the door.

name: annerose
normalized: it's about miki, isn't it?

name: rikurou
normalized: yes.

name: annerose
normalized: we're going to fulfill her request.
on my terms.
biting her lip, annerose swore thus.
then strode out of the room.

name: rikurou
normalized: annerose!
as i go to follow her…

name: neu
normalized: just a moment, young lad.

name: rikurou
normalized: huh?
wh-what is it!?
stopped by neu, i ask while running in place.

name: neu
normalized: now don't get all worked up.
here, have a seat.

name: rikurou
normalized: okay… so uh, what is it?

name: neu
normalized: young lad, do you know of the ultimate relationshipbetween a witch and immortal?

name: rikurou
normalized: the ultimate relationship between a witch and immortal?
no, i've never heard of it.

name: neu
normalized: it's called, 'familiar.
' it may be possible for you and little anne to use it.

name: rikurou
normalized: familiar…?

name: neu
normalized: all people have their own unique attribute.
for example, hot-tempered people have the 'fire' attribute, and those with strong patience are of the 'earth' attribute.

name: neu
normalized: witches discern a person's attribute and use them for their magical experiments as they see fit.

name: rikurou
normalized: that's why everyone knows it's best to steer clear ofa witch.

name: neu
normalized: and you, young lad, are a rare individual called an 'opportunist' without any attribute at all.

name: rikurou
normalized: o-opportunist…!?
like opportunist as in the whole 'opportunism' thing?

name: neu
normalized: that's right.
particular to floating through life, the laissez-faire, neets, and… bums!

name: rikurou
normalized: oof… miss neu, what's with all the downer treatment right before our big showdown?

name: neu
normalized: hrm?
what do you have to be down about?

name: neu
normalized: it's precisely because you're an 'opportunist' that little anne overcame the law of immortality, where only 1 in 100 succeed even if they have the potential for it.

name: rikurou
normalized: 1 in 100… annerose used a crazy magic like that on me… well, i guess that counts for something…"

name: neu
normalized: ooh, that's it, that hopelessly laissez-faire attitude is just what makes you an 'opportunist.

name: rikurou
normalized: i see… um, if you don't mind i think i'd better take off now.

name: neu
normalized: now hold on, this is the important part.
'familar' is a secret technique that only a tiny fraction of immortals can use.

name: rikurou
normalized: a secret technique!
you mean like a super move?
like something totally awesome or something?

name: neu
normalized: who knows?
it very well may be.
or maybe not.

name: rikurou
normalized: well which one is it?
this is important stuff here!

name: neu
normalized: i don't know.
it's only been passed down among magi that it exists.
none have yet to achieve it.

name: rikurou
normalized: uh… so essentially this was just a pep talk to help put my mind at ease?

name: neu
normalized: now you've got it.
it's sure to bolster your courage a bit knowing you have some unknown power sleeping within you.

name: rikurou
normalized: well, personally i'd prefer a power i'm familiar with that i can use right away… but thank you.
i do feel a little better now.

name: neu
normalized: mm, very good.
you have talent.
you must trust in that.

name: rikurou
normalized: talent!
i've got an awesome talent outside of this kinda lame sounding 'opportunist'!?
what kind of talent is it!?

name: neu
normalized: by talent i mean…"

name: rikurou
normalized: by talent you mean…!?

name: neu
normalized: you're a pervert.

name: rikurou
normalized: i'm a pervert!
puh, pervert…!?

name: neu
normalized: a super pervert.

name: rikurou
normalized: a super… pervert…"

name: neu
normalized: don't worry about understanding it for now.
take care of little anne out there!
keeheehee!

name: rikurou
normalized: the way you laugh is kind of creepy.

name: annerose
normalized: rick!

name: neu
normalized: listen, little anne's calling for you.

name: rikurou
normalized: r-right!
i thank neu who more or less boosted my spirits as i stand up and fly out of the room.
